definition: A facility where individuals engage in physical exercise and training activities, typically equipped with various exercise machines and equipment. It is commonly used to refer to a place where people go to work out, improve their physical fitness, and engage in different fitness activities.

examples.german: Ich gehe dreimal pro Woche ins Fitnessstudio.
examples.english: I go to the gym three times a week.

examples.german: Das Fitnessstudio hat viele moderne Ger√§te.
examples.english: The gym has many modern machines.

examples.german: Mein Freund arbeitet als Trainer im Fitnessstudio.
examples.english: My friend works as a trainer at the gym.

examples.german: Im Fitnessstudio kann man verschiedene Kurse besuchen.
examples.english: At the gym, you can attend various classes.

examples.german: Ich habe mich im Fitnessstudio angemeldet.
examples.english: I signed up at the gym.
